sentences.en: a slim waist
sentences.cn: 纤腰

sentences.en: a slim young woman
sentences.cn: 身材苗条的年轻女子

sentences.en: He published only three slim volumes of verse in his short life.
sentences.cn: 在他短暂的一生里，他只出版过3卷薄薄的诗集。

sentences.en: He was a slim, solemn, darkly handsome young man.
sentences.cn: 他是个身材修长、表情庄重、皮肤黝黑的帅小伙。

sentences.en: her slim, supple body
sentences.cn: 她苗条灵活的身体

sentences.en: How can I slim down my hips?
sentences.cn: 我怎样才能让臀部变瘦点？

sentences.en: How do you keep so slim?
sentences.cn: 你是怎么保持苗条的？

sentences.en: Jean is pretty, of slim build, with blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 珍妮非常漂亮，身材苗条，有一双蓝色的眼睛。

sentences.en: Many firms have had little choice but to slim down.
sentences.cn: 许多公司几乎别无选择，只能裁员。

sentences.en: She is tall and slim.
sentences.cn: 她身量修长.

sentences.en: She is trying to slim by jogging [ dieting ].
sentences.cn: 她正用跑步法 [ 节食法 ] 来减肥.

sentences.en: She says health is priceless, and I agree, but then I look so slim at the moment.
sentences.cn: 她说健康是无价的，我同意她的说法，但是我现在看起来非常苗条。

sentences.en: She was a young woman, fairly tall and fairly slim.
sentences.cn: 她是个身材修长的年轻女子。

sentences.en: She was tall and slim.
sentences.cn: 她是个瘦高个儿。

sentences.en: Some people will gain weight, no matter how hard they try to slim.
sentences.cn: 有些人无论多么努力地减肥，都会长肉。

sentences.en: The company recently slimmed its product line.
sentences.cn: 该公司最近缩减了生产线。

sentences.en: The fashion model had a very slim figure.
sentences.cn: 那个时装模特身材苗条.

sentences.en: The red dress had slim black piping around the neck.
sentences.cn: 这条红裙的领口有细细的黑色滚边。

sentences.en: The slim booklets describe a range of services and facilities.
sentences.cn: 这些薄薄的小册子介绍了一系列服务和设施。

sentences.en: The specialist who carried out the brain scan thought Tim's chances of survival were still slim.
sentences.cn: 给蒂姆做脑部扫描的专科医生认为他活下来的可能性仍旧渺茫。

sentences.en: There were only slim pickings to be made at the fair.
sentences.cn: 在交易会上只能捞些小油水。

sentences.en: There’s only a slim chance that anyone survived the crash.
sentences.cn: 这次失事有人生还的机会极为渺茫。

trans.tran_en: someone who is slim is attractively thin

trans.tran_cn: (Slim)人名；(阿拉伯)萨利姆；(英、西)斯利姆

trans.tran_en: to make yourself thinner by eating less, taking a lot of exercise etc
to make yourself thinner by eating less, taking a lot of exercise etc
